title: Cuban Artists: The Prodigious Decade
short_info: A thoughtfully curated project that showcased a significant selection of historic and recent artwork produced by Cuban artists from the 80's generation who are now recognized as pioneers for contemporary art.
long_info:
Nestled in the heart of the art deco district and located mere steps from iconic Lincoln Road and Miami Beach Convention Center. This all-suite hotel is united with captivating collections of art, creating one of the finest South Beach luxury locations.

  • Free Admission for 2 Guests to the Perez Art Museum Miami (PAMM)
  • Free Breakfast for 2 daily at the signature restaurant Canvas
  • Free Art Circuit Guide
  • Private Art Tour of Hotel's current Art Exhibit with Resident Art Advisor
  • Overview of Miami's Cultural Spots with Resident Art Advisor
